meanings.definition: A person or thing that hems.
meanings.sent1: The skilled hemmer neatly finished the edges of the dress.
meanings.sent2: I asked the hemmer to fix the hem of my pants.
meanings.sent3: The little hemmer doll always made sure the clothes were perfectly stitched.
meanings.sent4: Her precision with the needle made her a true hemmer of the group.
meanings.sent5: The hemmer's hands moved swiftly, creating beautiful seams.

meanings.definition: A sewing machine attachment for hemming fabric.
meanings.sent1: Mom attached the hemmer to the sewing machine to finish the curtains.
meanings.sent2: The new hemmer made sewing hems much easier.
meanings.sent3: The hemmer attachment hummed as it worked its magic on the fabric.
meanings.sent4: The hemmer accessory was a game-changer for her sewing projects.
meanings.sent5: With the hemmer in place, the sewing machine worked like a charm.

meanings.definition: A tool used for folding and pressing hems.
meanings.sent1: The hemmer tool helped create crisp edges on the skirt.
meanings.sent2: She used the hemmer to make the perfect fold on the fabric.
meanings.sent3: The hemmer gadget was her secret weapon for flawless hems.
meanings.sent4: With the hemmer in hand, she tackled the sewing project with ease.
meanings.sent5: The hemmer tool ensured every hem was impeccably pressed.
